name: 6-12-25 Method (Poliquin)
time_per_session_breakdown: Each tri-set ~2-3 min total + rest, repeated 3 times
overview_and_execution: Pick 3 exercises for the same muscle. First do 6 reps heavy, then immediately 12 reps moderately loaded, then 25 reps lighter, with minimal rest between. Rest 2-3 min, repeat for 3 total tri-sets.
example_application: Chest: A1: DB Bench 6 reps, A2: Incline Press 12 reps, A3: Cable Fly 25 reps, rest 2 min, repeat x2.
important_notes: Intense metabolic stress. Good short cycle for hypertrophy shock. Usually done on single muscle focus.
volume_metrics: Each tri-set = 6+12+25=43 reps, repeated 3 times = 129 reps total
